announcements.title: AuraFX Beta Notice
announcements.message: AuraFX is currently in beta. If you encounter any issues, please report them at discord/yaslicadi.

announcements.title: Join Our Discord!
announcements.message:
Be part of the AuraFX community on Discord!
You can ask questions, get support, share your feedback, and connect with other users and our team.
Whether youâ€™re looking for help, want to suggest new features, or just want to chat, our Discord is the place to be.
